name: DesignThinking
0:
”Alexa open design thinking”
”Alexa ask design thinking one more”
”Alexa tell design thinking next”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: design thinking
des:
Design Thinking is a key problem solving methodology. Various organizations across the world employs Design Thinking approach, its tools an techniques in designing their products and services. Purpose of this Skill is to help designers learn about Design Thinking and its various tools and techniques as suggested by some of the prominent organizations, institutions.

To start using Design Thinking skill, just say "Open Design Thinking", you can keep learning by saying next or yes to user prompts, to stop learning just say Stop or No to user prompts.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
